GameUA //SplashActivity Powered by LircayHub Developer by Maximiliano Solis //CarreraModeActivity (MainActivity) Score: 0 Level: 1 Lives: 3 In career mode you have three lives and 10 seconds per instruction. You lose one life for each mistake or missed instruction. //LegendaryModeActivity Score: 0 Level: 1 The legendary mode is more difficult. You have only 3 seconds to perform the action.
